lead_paragraph: Investors are worrying that Greece may default on its debt, and several big United States companies fell after reporting disappointing results.

headline.main: Market Closes Down Sharply After a Slump in Europe
headline.print_headline: Market Closes Down Sharply After a Slump in Europe
